website_summaries.verdict: Although this pillow comes with a few frustrating quirks, it's worth a look if you like the idea of a lengthy design that provides comfort from your head to your legs.
pros: This pillow's long structure provides full-body support while the soft cushioning promotes relaxation
Plushy head rest gives extra support to the head and neck
Features a top hook for hanging it to dry after bath time
cons: The suction cups don't work well on all tub surfaces, so it tends to move around while using it

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable Full body bath pillow for relaxing baths!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Full Body Bath Pillow!! It came in a nice little tote bag, so I was pretty impressed with the packaging. The material is very soft and pillow like. It's very breathable. I have a big bathtub and it fits pretty well. It's very comfortable and I take long baths. I also loved that it came with a laundry bag to wash in the washing machine which is genius! It will never get smelly then. It hangs up easily in my shower when I'm done and dries completely. Great product!! I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gina T.

customer_reviews.title: This bath pillow is soooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: When I was searching for bath pillows, I was originally looking for just neck and shoulders. Then I saw someone else's review on this pillow and how it was so comfortable and her husband absolutely loved it. I don't know who you are, but thank you for writing that review! My tub is pretty deep and is not very comfortable on the backside, so I ordered this pillow and have only used it once, but I can tell you that I will be enjoying more baths from now on simply because this pillow is so amazing and extremely comfortable. If you have any doubts about ordering this pillow... don't! It's totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KPScent

customer_reviews.title: Cushy Bath Body Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft, cushy, and thick this pillow is! It stays in place, too. I have bad sciatica and haven't been able to take a bath because lying in the tub has set off pain. Now, I am very comfortable and I'm able to soak in epson salt which helps the pain. Thank you Soothing Company!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Best accessory for a long soothing hot bath!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Had the best experience using this for a long relaxing hot bath. It was comfortable and very soft. Once in place it doesn’t move at all. It also dried very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: I really hate this bath pillow and really hate myself for spending smooch money on it. I had to throw it out after one use. The pillow doesn't stay attached at all and actually made me fall and gets any kind of hair or fiber stuck in it as well as stains really easily. I tried washing it and it was so dirty. don't buy this
customer_reviews.author: galeen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice. I have scoliosis and it helps my back relax as I take a bath. Just make sure you hang it up right after bath. If your washer isn't big enough to wash it .... then give it a bath with some detergent in the bath and lay a towel on the floor and roll it in the towel to ring out lots of the water ... then hang it to dry for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndee

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, but this is not comfortable and the suction cups are crappy so it moves around a lot. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Get this for a better bath
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups on this work extremely well and the pad is exactly what my girlfriend needed to enjoy her baths. Highly recommend this item and it is very easy to hang up and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best bath pillow ever! So plush!
customer_reviews.text: Best bath pillow ever! It's so much more plush than my previous one. The actual head pillow is also much thicker and more comfortable than other bath pillows I've had. Shipping was fast. All of that for about $12 less than my previous inferior purchase. Another reviewer mentioned the hook bring too small; my bathroom door has extremely large hooks and I'm able to hang this bath pillow no problem. I definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to vastly improve the comfort of their bathing routine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy This One
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this bath pillow. I read tons of reviews for this product category before purchasing - save yourself the time - buy this one. I've been using it for nearly 9 months and it is holding up really well. The suction power is more than adequate. You really do have to make sure that it dries out daily. If it starts to get discolored, which mine has at the very bottom because it almost never completely dries out since I use it every day, I've just popped it in the washer a few times with a little bleach and hung it outside over the fence until it's completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Littell

customer_reviews.title: Great bath pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It comes in a nice bag and even has a laundry bag to wash it in.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Suctions Slip a lot
customer_reviews.text: Love the pillow itself fits my bath perfectly but the suctions don't stay put well so it floats up in the water a lot. If you don't mind that it's a good product for the price point. It's definitely better than sitting on your hard tub surface. Hang up and let it dry. I spray mine with a anti bacterial /microbial solution from Walmart Or Target to keep it disinfected so that mold spores or anything can't grow on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and low maintenance
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this bath pillow. It's surprisingly plush, and very comfortable to lie on. As long as the tub is dry before placement, the suction adheres cleanly, and stays put (even with shifting and jostling). Supremely easy to clean, and dries off quickly. I usually hang it up in a shower curtain ring to let it drip-dry, and it's bone-dry in less than an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Jzhimn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for those who enjoy long baths.
customer_reviews.text: For people who enjoy the nice long bath but do not like the hard surface of the tub after ten minutes this is for you. The padding is comfortable, the number of suction cups keep it in place very well. Machine washable as well makes it great for those who like the bath bombs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help make my bath comfortable and safe after back surgery. The suction cups are strong but only stick to smooth surfaces so if you have a texture pattern on the base of the tub it won’t stick. Just sticking the top 2 was fine for me. It dries quickly - I just stick it to the shower wall.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, poor suction cups
customer_reviews.text: The best itself is very comfy. My ONLY issue is that it doesnt stay up with the suction cups. They just dont work. I am gonna try and buy better cups. The bath bed itself is amazing and I love it
customer_reviews.author: S.R Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: This bath pillow is awesome. It is soft and comfy and goes all the way down the tub under my body. I haven't tried to wash it yet, but it came with a bag for machine washing. After I use it, I hang it so the excess water drains from it and into the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy soaker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! As someone who spends a bit of time in the bathtub (back issues) I can't believe I waited so long to get one. The only reason it isn't a solid five stars for me is because the suction cups don't stay in place very well. This may be due to the surface if my bathtub, but I'm not sure. That aside, this pillow provides the right amount of support and the padding throughout the body is enough that you won't feel the suction cups through it while you're relaxing in the tub. I was skeptical about spending the money on it but I'm glad I did and would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Just Amber!

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it was a little longer
customer_reviews.text: A very nice mat and affordable. It has breathable material, hang it up and walk away after use. I haven’t used it enough to know after how many uses to throw it in the wash. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 was the length was a little short (went about half down the tub).
customer_reviews.author: Laura Marie

customer_reviews.title: Changed My Bath Pleasure!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Bath Pillow. The suction is great. I have had it for a few months and have used in many times with zero issues. I put Bath Pillow in while the Garden tub is filling up, throw in my bath bombs, pour my wine, put my Ipad on my garden tub zen tray and relax for an hour. This bath pillow is so much better than nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nanea

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, don't buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst bathmat imaginable. The suction cups have all fallen off, the mat smells awful despite multiple washings. Speaking of washing, the bag that is included to wash the mat broke the first time. The pillow is almost completely flat and there is no support whatsoever. I take nightly baths due to a chronic health condition and this was supposed to be a great purchase. And we unfortunately missed the return date because of my health. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Full body Bath Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully comfy bath pillow just have to be careful not to fall asleep . I lost a lot of weight so this has restored my bathing pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Willow

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for Chronic Pain Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia, osteoporosis arthritis, chronic fatigue, a bad back and neck. I take hot baths for the pain and the bath pillow is wonderful! I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Key

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bath pillow is everything promised. My only problem is that occasionally the suction cups are a bit difficult to pry up. If I wait a few hours, they are easier. It’s so nice to have a cushion for my tailbone.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie’sMom

customer_reviews.title: Length is perfect for a standard tub
customer_reviews.text: The mat is very soft. The suction cups are GREAT. There is a little hook attached to make it easy to hang for drying. This would be perfect for a standard tub but for a deep spa tub it’s too short.
customer_reviews.author: Carlasveryown

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, and I have no regrets of my purchase. The only suggestions I would have is add two more suction cups to the back area to make it stronger and eliminate the suction cups in the body area they really are needed. I'm so the body area Pat could be a little bit thicker but that's just me I spend a couple hours in the tub at a time and the extra padding would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pasyngr

customer_reviews.title: Must have for relaxing bath
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! It definitely took my evening relax time to the next level. It is super comfy, has great suction, and easy to hang up to dry. I haven't washed it yet, but it does come with a mesh bag for the washing machine that will make it easier. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pierce

customer_reviews.title: get this
customer_reviews.text: this is sOo comfortable in th tub. literally does feel like a cloud, even in the water. love how its machine washable and comes with a bag and instructions on how to wash and dry it
customer_reviews.author: hipHipHooray

customer_reviews.title: Best tub liner I've owned so far!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this bath liner. I bought it for him but it has been a blessing for me also. Makes taking my late night bath so much more comfortable as the cushioning it provides is just right. It also helps keep me warmer as I have a cast iron tub that can be quite cold in the winter. The suction cups are incredibly strong and we just hang ours right on our tub liner wall to drip back into the tub and drip dry when we are done bathing. I fully recomend this product and plan on getting it as a gift for family members when their birthdays roll around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I found the mat comfortable and it did not slip. The pillow is comfortable too. It's a bit hard to fold into the washing bag (you put it in the bag supplied when washing it so the suction cups don't get torn off), but other than that, it washes nicely. We air dry it by hanging it over a rack, but it might be alright to dry in a dryer, I just don't know.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Ruins my spa vibe every time
customer_reviews.text: Just.... Don't. Slides everywhere, doesn't stick, too thin, narrow, and long. All bad
customer_reviews.author: SHOOPY

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it she's so skinny she brushes in tub so it does help it does way alot when when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan.melek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Kept slipping down while sitting on it did not suction very well had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great buy. Awesome suction power and comfy to lie on. I was worried it would be a pain to care for in order to avoid mildew, but it actually dries out on its own very quickly! Nice!
customer_reviews.author: K. Robben

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who has osteoarthritis, and had a severe car accident 2 years ago where she broke multiple ribs, fractured and broke some vertebrae, and fractured her hips. She bought a home with a huge tub but couldn’t lay in it because the hard tub hurt her body. She used this and said it felt amazing! She couldn’t feel any of the hard tub below her. She loved the pillow it came with, the bag to wash it and was super excited for the hook to hang dry! Worth every penny to get my mom to be able to relax in a tub again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Eyleen S

customer_reviews.title: Good but make sure you dry it thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable, my only complaint is that it is very easy to get that mildew smell because if you don’t dry it completely after use, water droplets stay on the back of it and quickly start to smell.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this!!! I have a lot of injuries from over 50 years of riding, and falling off lol, horses. Had some really bad accidents too. I couldn't sit in my tub, the hardness made me hurt so badly, with is I can soak in my tub again to relax my muscles!!
customer_reviews.author: linda davis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: This bath body pillow greatly improved the comfort of my bathtub. The suctions cups stick well to hold it in place. I hang it in the shower after use and it dries in under 12 hrs. I great gift for any bath lover!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY GOOD MATERIAL.
customer_reviews.text: FOR A BATH SOAK WITH MY BEST ESSENTIAL OILS. V GOOD GRIP .
customer_reviews.author: Ana Tai

customer_reviews.title: Cushy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quick dry and very comfortable. Was exactly as hopped for with lots of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: M.Stack

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife's birthday. She loves it and says its the most comfortable one she's ever had, and she's had a few.
customer_reviews.author: Banzi29

customer_reviews.title: Like the product dont love it
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the design of this. It fits well in my bathtub and I enjoy it for short periods of time. My only issue is that the material is super itchy. It could be my skin but I am not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy M.

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Made relaxing in the tub much more enjoyable! Having a lot of suction cups made it very easy to place and once placed it didn’t move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as nice as expected
customer_reviews.text: This bath pillow is exactly what I wanted. It's comfortable, easy to set up, and easy to clean. Perfect for a nice relaxing soak in the tub with a good book.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: She really likes it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my girlfriend. She really likes it and says its easy to use. Very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Best bathmat ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I experience a lot of pain in my joints and find that soaking in a nice hot tub with bubbles and Epsom salts helps me. I have tried several different mats and pillows over the years but this one really hits home. It is comfortable, easy to clean after my soak and most important, stays in one place the entire time. Great suction.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Jasik

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This pillow is so comfortable and it dries quickly. I did have to change out the hook in order to hang it, but other than that, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. Ill be ordering more from this Company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more bruises when I bathe!
customer_reviews.text: The full body bath pillow has been very effective. It is long enough, comfortable, and the suction cups keep it firmly in place. No more bruises when I take a bath. It’s easy to dry. The included bag for laundering the pillow is a nice touch. I like the case that contains it. All in all I’m very happy with your product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas. She enjoyed using it for about a month, then like many others who have reviewed the product, a suction cup tore off. So we had a good 30-day run before our $50 bath math broke. More overpriced Chinese junk from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Proudamerican82

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a comfy relaxing bath-yum!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a comfortable bath. Suction cups work great to hold in place. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Nice storage bag. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bath mat.  Extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very comfortable, and the pads under the mat keep it safe and in place. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but suction cups do not all suction!
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups are terrible! Only the ones at the top stick and I've tried many times. I'm still able to use it tho I just have to be gentle so the few suctions that work dont pull off. It's very comfortable but towards the bottom it is a little itchy. For the amount of money I paid tho I'm not completely satisfied. But I do plan to keep the product since I take a bath daily and I need the comfort of the bath mat.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hauke

customer_reviews.title: Drains water very quickly and easily
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this bath pillow is how easily it drains of water after each use. I’ve tried a few different types of bath pillows and this one is the nices quality. It was a little scratchy at first, but that went away after two uses. Really nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my new husband ..... he likes to soak in the tub some nights after a very physical day at work ..... this product definitely made his soak time much more comfortable and relaxing .... thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Pace

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used the suction pillow lounger for the first time today! Love it! Great addition to the relaxing bath experience!
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bath matt
customer_reviews.text: Order came very promptly and was as described on website.
customer_reviews.author: Donamae Clinebell

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! The suctions stay in place the entire time u are using it! I love how its machine washable and comes with a storage bag. It dries quickly so you can put it away shortly after use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Soft steam cushion
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my steam room. The tile seats always get so cold, so the pad is soft and also comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Severns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The bath pillow was just what i expected. Soft and easy to use. Dries quickly. Looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Saraceno

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a luxurious mat. Thick and comfortable for when you want to relax in the tub a bit longer. It dries quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Y Lozano

customer_reviews.title: VEEERRY COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat is great! I was surprised at how soft yet durable it is. I can sit in the tub for hours and never have any aches!
customer_reviews.author: MzLuv

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased this sooner! The suction cups are top notch and what ever material it is made out of dries quickly unlike past bath pillow purchases. This one really upped my bath game. I would highly recommend if you takes baths regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and look.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this yet, but the fit and look is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at its best
customer_reviews.text: Makes my bath so much more enjoyable. It’s extremely comfortable and easy to use! At the end of my bath I just wash it off with the shower head and hang it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Made a relaxing bath much more relaxing. My tailbone always hurts during a bath. This cushioned whole back and made experience even better. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my pregnant wife to provide some additional comfort as baths became more frequent in the last trimester. She seems to enjoy it as it is still being used! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have back issues!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something to give me extra comfort and support for by back while in the bath tub. I have osteoprosis and compression fractures in my back. Taking a bath can be painful. This is just what I needed. The suction cups don't always stick but it doesn't seem to matter cause when I lay on the phone pillow it doesn't move. I highly recommend this for people with back issues!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Once the suction cups are secured with the pillow in proper position, it works beautifully and is very comfortable. I have not cleaned it yet but the hang to dry feature is very easy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works as indicated. My husband needs the support for his back and neck so, he liked it. It could be a but thicker but, it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible, it is SO cheaply made and doesn’t even stick to the bath tub. Do not waste your money like I did. I’d like a refund, buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Braden Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to use this mat and I am in love!! It is so comfortable and easy to use...I love taking a bath even more. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybugsmom

customer_reviews.title: Try it once and you will never be naked again in a naked bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Just add epsom salts & baking soda, and favorite essential oil, and you can go straight to heaven. Will never leave home without it, if going overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! super comfy. Be careful with the suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great. I was hesitant because of the price, but it is worth it! I fell asleep in the tub the first time I used it, it’s that comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups require a smooth surface to attach to.
customer_reviews.text: The bath pillow is comfortable and the pillow is a plus; however, the suction cups do not work with my non-smooth tub surface. I am able to hold the bath pillow in place by attaching it to tiles above my spa tub, with two suction cups; but it's higher out of the tub than I would like for comfort and soaking.
customer_reviews.author: Earleen D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bliss
customer_reviews.text: What a dream come true! One of the best purchases ever! So comfortable and safe from any slippage in the tub! I almost fell asleep in the tub with how comfortable I was. I am a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just need a neck pillow to go with it and it's even better! Good item.
customer_reviews.author: Buyerny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution to uncomfortable tubs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solutions for hard ceramic tubs. My tub has a textured bottom, so the suction cups aren’t able to stick, but that’s a me problem. I’m on my feet 10-12 hours a day. This thing has made a soak for my sore muscles a pleasure, rather than a chore. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cucinotta

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m greatly pleased with this product!! It is so soothing and so soft. Stays where you put it and I highly recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: JesusSaves

customer_reviews.title: WIN WIN!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly in love with this! I do factory work and soaking in a hot epson salt bath is a MUST for joint pain. (Not to mention a great way to pamper just because.) I could literally fall asleep on this. As an added bonus... my 2yr old granddaughter loves the bath and I can lay this down and not worry about her slipping. win win!!
customer_reviews.author: kshoppell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups work well, hangs and dries overnight. Sooo comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Tukuhnikivats

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised, wonderfully comfortable, and easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a WONDERFUL product if you have trouble laying in a bathtub! Exactly as advertised, I would recommend this to anyone with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and my favorite purchase
customer_reviews.text: The suction kinda sucks but honestly I use this every single week. It’s very comfortable and easy to wash/clean. It also comes with a hook at the top to be able to hang and store it easily
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loved it. Do as others have recommended by using a regular kitchen knife to help release the seal on the suction cups on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: timmy_6262

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The best full body tub pillow! So comfortable and beautiful! Great quality as well! Once it’s stuck it isn’t moving!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend and she loves it. A must have for anyone that enjoys a relaxing bath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Body bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item comfortable and does not block the jets in my bathtub. Recomend it
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Must have! So comfy and relaxing! Easy to clean! Stays in place, no slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Better baths
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable bath cushion, really helps with all the unpleasant pressure points when sitting in a hard bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion and neck support
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like a hot soak in the tub after a long cold rainy day. This bath pillow makes a good thing even better. It provides cushion and neck support. Easily hangs from a towel hook for drying.
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable! Fits just right.
customer_reviews.text: I love my full bath body pillow! It does exactly what I expected of it, it supports my back and my head when relaxing in the tub. So comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is comfortable to lay on it dries easily I definitely would order
customer_reviews.author: DONNA SMRZ

customer_reviews.title: Works, but could give better support.
customer_reviews.text: For a short bath this is great, but for a long bath it needs more cushioning and support.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: It stays in place it has goog suction.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bath pillow 3 times a week since I recieved it. I love it it keeps me from sliding around and is comfortable. The only thing I would of liked different if the neck support would of been bigger and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Comfortable and dries fast. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, comfortable bathing
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this pillow! My tub is not very comfortable, so this really helped. The only thing that I could suggest is some lumbar support and a foot longer. I think that those modifications would benefit taller bathers with weak lower backs even better!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Great item at the right price!
customer_reviews.text: Now I can take a bath comfortably. Love the soft cushion and overall material. Great price too. I appreciate the mesh that came with it for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Emgee21

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The suction is great (almost a little too great- it takes a little time to remove from the tub, ha!) and it is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dowdy Family

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but has terrible suction cups.
customer_reviews.text: It was a okay buy. Its comfortable and geta the job done so to speak. My main issue is the suction cups on the bottom are horrible. They don't stay suctioned to the tub and when i move it likes to slide down. But other than that its works i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Ricketts

product_meta.title: Soothing Company Full Body Bath Pillow Bathtub Back, Head and Neck Rest Support for Luxury Comfort | Spa Cushion for Jacuzzi Hot Tub | Quick Drying, Machine Wash Safe | Fits Most Tubs | 50 Inches
feature_bullets: ✅ QUICK-DRYING DESIGN – Unique 3D mesh material used in all of our full body bathtub pillows makes this bath accessory extremely hygienic, thanks to its breathable, quick-drying design.
✅13 SUCTIONS CUPS. Our full body bathtub pillow has 13 high quality, extra-strength suction cups to keeps it firmly secured on the bathtub.
✅AIR-MESH TECHNOLOGY. It makes our bathtub pillow stay cool and comfortable. The quilted 3D mesh fabric allows constant airflow which makes this spa pillow dry fast.
✅EXTRA-DURABILITY. This bath spa pillow is pretty durable and will last you through a good many uses.
✅SUPERIOR COMFORT AND SUPPORT. This super-soft full body design cushions and provides comfort for your whole body
